member.name: T:Microsoft.WindowsMobile.IApplicationLauncher
member.summary: Defines the properties, methods, and events that are shared by any object that can have an application launched.

member.name: M:Microsoft.WindowsMobile.IApplicationLauncher.EnableApplicationLauncher(System.String)
member.summary: Enables an application to be launched.
member.remarks: EnableApplicationLauncher attempts to learn the application file name; if it cannot, then an exception is thrown.

member.name: M:Microsoft.WindowsMobile.IApplicationLauncher.EnableApplicationLauncher(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Enables an application to be launched, using its launch ID and file name.
member.param: The path to executable to launch.

member.name: M:Microsoft.WindowsMobile.IApplicationLauncher.EnableApplicationLauncher(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Enables an application to be launched; using its launch ID, its file name, and the list of any parameters it might need.
member.param: The path to executable to launch.
The string of parameters to pass to launched application.

member.name: M:Microsoft.WindowsMobile.IApplicationLauncher.DisableApplicationLauncher
member.summary: Disables the application from being launched.

member.name: P:Microsoft.WindowsMobile.IApplicationLauncher.ApplicationLaunchId
member.summary: Gets the ID that uniquely identifies a particular application launch request.
member.remarks: An application can have multiple application launch requests, but their ID's must all be unique.

member.name: P:Microsoft.WindowsMobile.IApplicationLauncher.ApplicationToLaunch
member.summary: Gets the fully qualified path-name of the application (the executable) to launch.

member.name: P:Microsoft.WindowsMobile.IApplicationLauncher.ApplicationArguments
member.summary: Gets optional params to pass to the application to launch.

member.name: T:Microsoft.WindowsMobile.ApplicationLauncherEnableException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when Application Launcher Registration fails.

member.name: M:Microsoft.WindowsMobile.ApplicationLauncherEnableException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ApplicationLauncherEnableException class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.WindowsMobile.ApplicationLauncherEnableException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ApplicationLauncherEnableException class, using an error message containing additional details about the failure.
member.param: A string containing further details about the exception.

member.name: M:Microsoft.WindowsMobile.ApplicationLauncherEnableException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ApplicationLauncherEnableException class, using an error message containing additional details about the failure, and an inner exception.
member.param: A string containing further details about the exception.
